page.title: 16PASTIMES
page.content: The Church is active in the area, Buxton has a choir, a Mother's Union and a team of bell_ringers. The church at R.A.F. Coltishall also has a choir and Youth groups. Buxton and Lammas join together for many activities and have the following organisations: a Women's Institute, Youth and Adult Football teams, Scouts Guides, Cubs and Brownies, an Old People's Club, a Young Wive's Group, a Bowls Club, a branch of the British Legion, a Babygroup, a Playgroup, a branch of the Red Cross, The Lammas Mens' Society (which is a social club), an Oddfellows Lodge. At R.A.F. Coltishall there are many social activities for the serving personel, their wives and families. Buxton/Lammas has a Parish Council which consists of 11 elected members and a Parish Clerk.
